message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a novel per-task routing method for multi-task applications using neural networks. This involves learning flexible parameter sharing between tasks using routing networks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning) as the paper focuses on developing a new method for multi-task learning. Additionally, the paper also involves computer vision (cs.CV) as it applies the proposed method to the Omniglot benchmark. The paper also involves artificial intelligence (cs.AI) as it proposes a new method for learning flexible parameter sharing. Neural networks are a key component of the proposed method, which falls under the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper also involves natural language processing (cs.CL) as it discusses the use of routing networks, which are commonly used in language models.
